name: Ricetta: pollo ai Fiordolci
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sweet Madame.

value.name: Pollame
value.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

value.name: Fiordolce
value.desc: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

value.name: Pollo ai Fiordolci
value.desc: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.

value.name: Rosaria
value.desc: Nel caso di Rosaria, l'abito Ã¨ l'unica cosa che faccia la monaca. Famosa per la sua parlantina pungente e i suoi modi glaciali, lavora spesso da sola.

value.name: Cena del giudizio
value.desc: Rosaria's specialty. The seemingly dark thorns make it hard to know how to begin tucking in. After some effort, you manage to clear the ornamentation away... and to your surprise, the first taste of the tender chicken unveils a shockingly lovely taste. As Rosaria studies your reaction, she seems pleased.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Available at the start of the game</color>
